reviews.review: shes so nice ! easy class (barely came maybe like 10 times in total ) and passed with a 84% and pretty good topics, midterm was kinda hard but thats on me for not taking notes ngl, no final but a group project, overall chill teacher and class

shes so sweet! As a person she's very kind and very understanding, as a professor, she does read off the slides but she does at times thruout lecture go off for good examples, I'm a gvpt major and please take this class for spring!! Would usually come to only monday lectures and barely went to disscusion as she posts the notes online but most of the people I know in this class got a B- and maybe B+ as the highest

name: GVPT206
title: Appetite for Change: Politics and the Globalization of Food
description: An overview of the major forces transforming the food system--political, economic, technological, environmental--and the political debates surrounding them.
